Sci-fi drama, starring Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway and Michael Caine.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A talented thief uses hi-tech devices to enter other people's dreams so he can steal their secrets. An industrialist hires him to perform a far more challenging job - to implant an idea into a corporate heir's mind, so he will think it is his own. However, the mission is compromised by the thief's own troubled psyche. Christopher Nolan's sci-fi thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Page, Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Tom Hardy.

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: A detective is sent to Alaska to investigate a murder during a month when the sun does not set. Sleep deprivation starts to take its toll, and he accidentally shoots his partner dead. He tries to cover it up, but the criminal they were hunting has seen everything and blackmails the cop into helping him escape justice. Thriller directed by Christopher Nolan, starring Al Pacino, Robin Williams and Hilary Swank.(n)

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
programme.desc: Retired bank robber John Doherty escapes a gunman with the aid of a young car thief, and together they go in search of the loot from the former crook's last job. When they discover the stash is missing - and John's thuggish old partners are also looking for it - the pair decide to do a repeat robbery. Comedy drama, starring Clint Eastwood, Jeff Bridges, George Kennedy and Geoffrey Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: A war veteran criss-crosses America with his disabled brother in tow as he builds a new career as a renowned prizefighter. However, his ruthless determination to make it to the top drives him to betray the people closest to him. Drama, starring Kirk Douglas, Marilyn Maxwell, Arthur Kennedy, Paul Stewart and Ruth Roman.(n)

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: The highly strung producer of a Washington news bureau falls for a handsome but arrogant and totally untalented new anchorman, but is unaware a humble reporter friend is deeply infatuated with her. Comedy, starring Holly Hunter, William Hurt and Albert Brooks. Featuring an uncredited cameo from Jack Nicholson.(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp.(n)

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers
programme.desc: The stories of three of the men in the famous photograph of US servicemen raising their flag on the island of Iwo Jima. After returning home from the battlefield, the veterans grapple with an increasing sense of survivor guilt as they struggle to adjust to everyday life. Clint Eastwood's Second World War drama, starring Adam Beach, Ryan Phillippe, Jesse Bradford, Jamie Bell and Paul Walker.(n)

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch.(n)

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: An enigmatic gunslinger forms an uneasy alliance with a military veteran to track down a notorious outlaw - but tensions simmer as their very different motives for the hunt put them increasingly at odds. Sergio Leone's Western sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volonte, Josef Egger, Mara Krup and Klaus Kinski.(n)

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone.(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp.(n)

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: A woman disappears without trace on her fifth wedding anniversary. Her husband contacts the police, but struggles to cope as his marriage is scrutinised by the media. As his behaviour grows stranger and more evasive, he finds himself accused of her murder. David Fincher's crime thriller based on Gillian Flynn's novel, starring Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike and Neil Patrick Harris.(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: A New Orleans detective's girlfriend is kidnapped by a vengeful criminal mastermind, who sets him a sadistic challenge. To save her, the cop must successfully complete a series of 12 death-defying challenges that send him on a dangerous race through the city. Action thriller, with John Cena, Aidan Gillen and Ashley Scott.

programme.title: Captain Ron
programme.desc: An American businessman learns that his recently deceased uncle has left him a yacht moored in the Caribbean, and ill-advisedly puts his trust in a wayward one-eyed mariner to help him and his family sail the vessel back to Miami. Comedy adventure, starring Kurt Russell, Martin Short, Mary Kay Place and Benjamin Salisbury.

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier agrees to testify against her gangster boyfriend after witnessing a murder. Placed in protective custody by the authorities, she is less than pleased to discover she is expected to pose as chaste nun Sister Mary Clarence in a convent. Comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Harvey Keitel, Maggie Smith, Bill Nunn and Kathy Najimy.

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules
programme.desc: A hapless youngster faces the daunting prospect of starting a new school year and desperately tries to impress a girl in his class. But as if that weren't enough to contend with, his parents also force him to spend more time with his bullying older brother. Children's comedy sequel, starring Zachary Gordon and Devon Bostick.

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A socially inept high-school student and his lonely unemployed brother find their eccentric home life thrown into upheaval when their meddling uncle comes to stay. The teenage oddball tries to make the best of his changing circumstances, while putting all his skills to the task of helping his new best friend win the class presidency. Comedy, starring Jon Heder, Efren Ramirez and Haylie Duff.

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: The manager of an apartment complex asks a Wall Street financier to manage pension funds for him and his friends, but the man pockets all the money instead. When he realises the fraudster is going to get away with the crime and the money will never be found, he enlists the help of a professional thief to steal it back. Crime comedy, with Ben Stiller, Eddie Murphy, Alan Alda, Tea Leoni, Casey Affleck and Matthew Broderick.

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: An elite military team takes on a top-secret mission in the jungles of Central America, but the soldiers realise they have been deceived by their CIA employers. A greater danger presents itself when they are stalked by a lethal alien big-game hunter with the power to become invisible, that has come to Earth to stalk human prey. Sci-fi thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers and Bill Duke.

programme.title: Bound
programme.desc: Ex-con Corky is trying to go straight, but veers off the rails when she meets Violet, the girlfriend of gangster Caesar. The women begin a torrid affair and concoct a risky plan to steal a fortune from the Mob, which would enable them to flee and start a new life. Thriller directed by the Wachowskis, starring Jennifer Tilly and Gina Gershon, with Joe Pantoliano, John P Ryan, Christopher Meloni and Richard C Sarafian.

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: Crew members of a cargo spacecraft answer a distress call from a derelict alien vessel. However, their mission of mercy has fatal repercussions when a deadly, seemingly indestructible monster gets on board their ship and starts killing them one by one. Ridley Scott's sci-fi horror, starring Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, Ian Holm and John Hurt.(n)

programme.title: The Death and Life of Charlie St Cloud
programme.desc: A man who survived the car crash that killed his brother becomes consumed with guilt. Taking a job in a cemetery, he begins seeing visions of his dead sibling and spends every night in the graveyard with him. When an old friend returns, she hopes to persuade him to let go of the past. Drama, starring Zac Efron, Charlie Tahan and Amanda Crew.(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
programme.desc: Weedy youngster Greg finds his plans for a lazy school holiday ruined when his mother bans video games and his father organises a series of family activities. When he finds out a girl he likes is working at a country club, he tells his family he has a summer job there as an excuse to spend time with her - but struggles to keep up the deception. Family comedy sequel, starring Zachary Gordon and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Jess befriends a new girl at school, and the pair begin to create their own imaginary kingdom in a secret place in the woods to escape the difficulties of their real lives. Unfortunately, a tragedy threatens to bring their fantasy world to an end. Drama based on Katherine Paterson's novel, starring Josh Hutcherson, AnnaSophia Robb, Zooey Deschanel and Robert Patrick.(n)

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: A father-of-two struggling to cope with the death of his wife is in need of a fresh start, so buys a house with a dilapidated zoo on the grounds. With the help of the keepers, he works to restore the attraction to its former glory, while also trying to reconnect with his troubled teenage son. Fact-based comedy drama, starring Matt Damon, Scarlett Johansson and Thomas Haden Church.(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: A workaholic father tries to make up for his perpetual absence from home by promising to buy his son a hugely popular action figure for Christmas - little realising every other father in town has the same idea. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Jake Lloyd, Rita Wilson, Robert Conrad and Phil Hartman.(n)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: An expert takes a contract from the CIA to test a maximum security prison by trying to break out of it , but he soon discovers he has been duped and that his captors intend him to stay inside forever. He hatches a plan to escape, but to succeed he will need the help of a long-term convict - who wants his own freedom in return for assistance. Thriller, with Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger.(n)

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth dreads the prospect of her 13th birthday, Jason enjoys his new job as a radio presenter, and supernatural forces seem to be at work in the family home.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin is attracted to a troubled artist, who asks to paint her picture. Grandma buys a canary, but finds it refuses to sing.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A snowstorm strikes as the Ingalls make their way home after a trip to Mankato, and they struggle to survive in a remote mountain cabin with little food.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Johnny Johnson drops out of school hoping to see the world, but his first adventure only gets him into trouble.

programme.title: To Live For
programme.desc: A terminally ill woman's last months are made happier by her relationship with a stranger she hopes will take care of her children. Romantic drama, starring Nancy Travis, Scott Bairstow, Jamie Renee Smith, Karen James and Viveka Davis.

programme.title: Going for the Gold: The Bill Johnson Story
programme.desc: Biopic of the downhill skier who went from juvenile delinquent to Olympic champion. However, his rebellious attitude and rebellious nature towards authority almost cost him his opportunity at the 1984 event. Starring Anthony Edwards, Sarah Jessica Parker and Dennis Weaver.

programme.title: Replacing Dad
programme.desc: A woman turns to her supportive mother for help after her unfaithful husband leaves her and their three children to move in with his lover. Family drama, starring Mary McDonnell, William Russ, Jack Coleman and Erik von Detten.

programme.title: The Murder of Mary Phagan
programme.desc: Part one of two. A Jewish factory owner in 1930s Georgia is unjustly accused of murder. Despite all the evidence pointing in another direction, an ambitious prosecutor and an unscrupulous journalist whip up a frenzy of anti-semitism against the suspect. However, the state governor sees through the bigotry and does everything in his power to see justice is done. Fact-based drama, starring Jack Lemmon, Peter Gallagher, Kevin Spacey and Richard Jordan.

programme.title: Presumed Guilty
programme.desc: A teenager is wrongly convicted of murder, prompting his father to set about getting him off the hook. Fact-based drama, starring Martin Sheen, Brendan Fraser, Caroline Kava and Mark Metcalf.

programme.title: No One Could Protect Her
programme.desc: A woman is raped in her own home, but the police seem powerless to apprehend the attacker. As reports of further sexual assaults in her neighbourhood mount up, all seemingly the work of the same man, she resolves to turn detective and bring him to justice herself. Thriller based on a true story, starring Joanna Kerns, Anthony John Denison and Peter MacNeill.

programme.title: Untamed Love
programme.desc: A teacher who specialises in tutoring children with learning difficulties forms a close bond with a violent girl traumatised by years of physical and psychological abuse. Fact-based drama, starring Cathy Lee Crosby, Ashlee Lauren, John Getz and Richard Fancy.

programme.title: In the Arms of a Killer
programme.desc: A rookie homicide cop lands herself in a dilemma after making the foolish mistake of becoming romantically involved with the prime suspect in a drug-related murder case. Thriller, starring Jaclyn Smith, John Spencer, Michael Nouri, Nina Foch and Sandahl Bergman.

programme.title: Word of Honor
programme.desc: A Vietnam veteran is shocked to be accused of engineering a massacre while serving in South East Asia, 30 years after the end of the conflict - prompting him to set out to prove his innocence. Drama based on a novel by Nelson DeMille, and starring Don Johnson, Jeanne Tripplehorn and Sharon Lawrence.

programme.title: Escape from Terror: The Teresa Stamper Story
programme.desc: A woman falls in love with the man she believes is Mr Right and hastily marries him, but it isn't long before he begins showing his true colours, forcing her to seek shelter at a safe house. Fact-based drama, starring Maria Pitillo, Adam Storke and Brad Dourif.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob offers to teach Elizabeth to drive, but she has little talent for it. Corabeth's secret drinking is getting out of hand, and threatens her career.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Verdie's daughter returns home after graduating from college, and is angry to find that racial prejudice stands in the way of her getting a job.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The locals celebrate the founding of Walnut Grove, but the contests held to mark the occasion bring out a competitive streak in the Ingalls and Oleson families.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Richest Man In Walnut Grove.
programme.desc: Charles loses his job at the lumber mill, so the family must all pull together to make ends meet.(n)

programme.title: The Cry
programme.desc: Part one of two. Psychological thriller about a bereaved mother who becomes obsessed with another woman's baby. Still grieving over her own loss, child protection officer Meg Bartlet befriends new mother Christine Rearden, but the relationship turns sour when Meg sets out to prove baby Eleanor's breathing problems are the result of abuse. Starring Sarah Lancashire, Emma Cunniffe, Anthony Calf, James Laurenson and Joe Duttine.(n)

programme.title: A Holiday to Remember
programme.desc: A single mum returns to her childhood home where she intends to escape from the pressures of life in Los Angeles - until an old boyfriend persuades her to rekindle the flames of their passion. Romantic drama, with Connie Sellecca, Randy Travis, Asia Vieria and Rue McClanahan.(n)

programme.title: Homeless to Harvard: The Liz Murray Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the tale of a neglected child who overcame her poverty-stricken and traumatic beginnings to achieve her dream of academic success at the prestigious American university. Starring Thora Birch, Michael Riley, Robert Bockstael and Makyla Smith.(n)

programme.title: The Murder of Mary Phagan
programme.desc: Part two of two. A Jewish factory owner in 1930s Georgia is unjustly accused of murder. Despite all the evidence pointing in another direction, an ambitious prosecutor and an unscrupulous journalist whip up a frenzy of anti-semitism against the suspect. However, the state governor sees through the bigotry and does everything in his power to see justice is done. Fact-based drama, starring Jack Lemmon, Peter Gallagher, Kevin Spacey and Richard Jordan.(n)

programme.title: I Heard the Owl Call My Name
programme.desc: A terminally ill priest is sent by his bishop to be minister to a Native Canadian coastal village. He becomes accepted into their community, and as he witnesses its gradual destruction, gains the strength to face his own fate without fear. Drama based on Margaret Craven's novel, starring Tom Courtenay and Dean Jagger.(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girl Murders
programme.desc: A detective is sent to investigate when the stars of a new raunchy calendar are murdered one at a time. He faces a race against time to find the killer before more blood is shed. Thriller, starring Tom Skerritt and Sharon Stone.(n)

programme.title: Runaway Father
programme.desc: A woman who has been living in poverty for 20 years following her husband's death learns that he is still alive, having faked his demise so he could abandon his family. She resolves to track him down and force him to accept his responsibilities. Fact-based drama, starring Donna Mills and Jack Scalia.(n)

programme.title: Angel in the Family
programme.desc: A widower reaches out to his estranged daughters after suffering a stroke and asks them to spend Christmas with him. Despite their misgivings, the warring sisters return home to be with him and experience a miracle when their late mother returns to life. Fantasy, starring Meredith Baxter, Tracey Needham, Natasha Gregson Wagner and Ronny Cox.(n)

programme.title: Murder in a College Town
programme.desc: Mother-of-two Rose Earl proudly sends her eldest son off to college, only for him to be led into a life of crime by his dastardly roommate. When he subsequently disappears without trace, Rose embarks on a desperate search to discover what has become of him. Drama, starring Kate Jackson, Drew Ebersole and Matthew Settle.(n)

programme.title: Jonathan Stone: Threat of Innocence
programme.desc: An ex-cop recovering from the death of his wife is accused of a murder he did not commit. He tries to prove his innocence by tracking down the real killer, enlisting the aid of a wealthy socialite. Crime drama, starring Richard Crenna and Beverly D'Angelo.(n)

programme.title: DC 9/11: Time of Crisis
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, as people across America attempted to come to terms with the tragedy, focusing on the reaction of President George W Bush and the advice given by his many advisors. Timothy Bottoms, John Cunningham, Andrew Gillies, Penny Johnson and Doug Lennox star.

programme.title: Hidden Children
programme.desc: Part one of two. Fact-based drama about Orphaned Jewish children from across Europe fleeing the Holocaust, who find a hiding place in an Italian villa. With Ken Duken. In Italian.

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: A sheriff prepares to hand in his badge and settle into married life, but the news that an infamous crook has broken out of jail, intent on revenge, ruins his plans. Western remake, starring Tom Skerritt, Susanna Thompson, Michael Madsen, Reed Diamond and Maria Conchita Alonso.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin finds an orphaned fawn and decides to nurse it back to health, while John-Boy's new job as a rent collector makes him extremely unpopular with the locals. Charles Tyner guest stars, with Richard Thomas.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. The anticipated joy of Thanksgiving turns to sorrow for the family when John-Boy suffers a head injury.

programme.title: Jodi Picoult's The Pact
programme.desc: The happy lives of two families are torn apart when their children enter into an apparent suicide pact, leaving one teenager dead, and another on trial for murder. Drama, starring Juliet Stevenson, Henry Czerny, Jessica Steen and Megan Mullally.

programme.title: Don't Die My Love
programme.desc: A high-school student bravely stands by her football star boyfriend as he undergoes painful treatment for cancer, but her mother's disapproval threatens to end their relationship. Tear-jerking emotional drama, starring Beth Broderick, Scott Vickaryous, Katie Herrod and Malcolm Stewart.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Star
programme.desc: A woman dreams of escaping the drudgery of everyday life and becoming a successful singer. A romance with a handsome stranger offers her hope - but the lovebirds are soon separated, and her spirits take another battering. Romantic drama, starring Jennie Garth, Craig Bierko, Terry Farrell and Ted Wass.

programme.title: Ann Rule's The Stranger Beside Me
programme.desc: An aspiring crime reporter is hired to investigate a series of grisly, unsolved murders stretching from Utah to Seattle, only to discover the killer is one of her closest friends. Fact-based thriller, starring Bill Campbell, Barbara Hershey, Kevin Dunn and Suki Kaiser.

programme.title: Telling Secrets
programme.desc: Part two of two. A woman is shocked to learn of her husband's infidelity, and her reaction leaves a lot to be desired as she vows to hunt down the other woman and kill her. Drama, starring Cybill Shepherd, Ken Olin and Christopher McDonald.

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Part one of two. Drama. A couple search for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, starring Shannen Doherty, Kevin Dillon, Edward Asner and Dixie Carter.

programme.title: Guilty Hearts
programme.desc: Part one of two. Fact-based crime drama about an Illinois man who murders his wife in order to be with his mistress. Treat Williams, Marcia Gay Harden and Gary Basaraba star.

programme.title: Prophet of Evil: The Ervil LeBaron Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, about religious fanatic Ervil LeBaron, who believed he had God's permission to kill anyone standing in the way of his drive for wealth and power. Starring Brian Dennehy, Tracy Needham and William Devane.

programme.title: Sharing the Secret
programme.desc: A teenager struggles with bulimia, while her psychologist mother deals with her guilt at not recognising the signs of an eating disorder. Drama, starring Alison Lohman, Mare Winningham and Roxana Brusso.(n)

programme.title: God Bless the Child
programme.desc: Poverty and hardship force a single mother and her seven-year-old daughter to move into a shelter for the homeless. Drama, starring Mare Winningham, Grace Johnston and Dorian Harewood.(n)

programme.title: Video Voyeur: The Susan Wilson Story
programme.desc: A woman is understandably horrified to discover her apparently kind-hearted neighbour has somehow managed to install state-of-the-art surveillance equipment throughout her home, so he can spy on her and her family. Fact-based drama, starring Angie Harmon, Jamey Sheridan and Dale Midkiff.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. John-Boy is rushed into hospital to have a blood clot removed from his brain.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The children are unhappy when Miss Hunter needs to take leave because of a family emergency and a substitute teacher is sent to take over her job.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Palomino
programme.desc: A photographer, struggling to overcome the break-up of her marriage by going to live on a friend's California ranch, where her riding skills impress the ranch hands - one of whom she embarks on a passionate affair with. However, her life takes a turn for the worse when her new lover is unable to cope with the class difference between them and an accident leaves her paralysed. Drama, starring Lee Horsley, Lindsay Frost, Eva Marie Saint and Rod Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Prophet of Evil: The Ervil LeBaron Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, about religious fanatic Ervil LeBaron, who believed he had God's permission to kill anyone standing in the way of his drive for wealth and power. Starring Brian Dennehy, Tracy Needham and William Devane.(n)

programme.title: An Element of Truth
programme.desc: A scheming woman working for a private investment company uses the knowledge gained from her job to plot a seemingly foolproof robbery. Thriller, with Donna Mills and Peter Reigert.(n)

programme.title: No One Could Protect Her
programme.desc: A woman is raped in her own home, but the police seem powerless to apprehend the attacker. As reports of further sexual assaults in her neighbourhood mount up, all seemingly the work of the same man, she resolves to turn detective and bring him to justice herself. Thriller based on a true story, starring Joanna Kerns, Anthony John Denison and Peter MacNeill.(n)

programme.title: Video Voyeur: The Susan Wilson Story
programme.desc: A woman is understandably horrified to discover her apparently kind-hearted neighbour has somehow managed to install state-of-the-art surveillance equipment throughout her home, so he can spy on her and her family. Fact-based drama, starring Angie Harmon, Jamey Sheridan and Dale Midkiff.(n)

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part drama. Shannen Doherty and Kevin Dillon star as parents searching for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, with Edward Asner, Dixie Carter and Michael Brandon.(n)

programme.title: Guilty Hearts
programme.desc: Conclusion. Fact-based crime drama about a manipulative Illinois doctor who murders his wife in order to be with his mistress. Treat Williams, Marcia Gay Harden and Gary Basaraba star.(n)

programme.title: Jonathan Stone: Threat of Innocence
programme.desc: An ex-cop recovering from the death of his wife is accused of a murder he did not commit. He tries to prove his innocence by tracking down the real killer, enlisting the aid of a wealthy socialite. Crime drama, starring Richard Crenna and Beverly D'Angelo.(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Get Even Before Leavin'. With the Russian mob threatening his family, Ray goes on a road trip with Mickey to Primm in hopes of recovering money stolen from a local casino owner. Meanwhile, Terry gains confidence as a trainer and gets renewed interest in the gym; and Bunchy and Bridget take turns looking after baby Maria when Teresa withdraws to her family's house to seek refuge from the pressures of being a new mom

programme.title: The Circus: Inside The Greatest Political Show on Earth
programme.desc: Trump Show. The political circus goes into overdrive as Donald Trump is crowned the Republican nominee, and his wife, Melania, delivers a controversial speech. Also: Trump's children try to humanize their dad; and Vice Presidential nominee Mike Pence strives for party unity

programme.title: Spring Breakers
programme.desc: In this one-of-a-kind crime comedy, four mischievous female college students fall under the spell of an eccentric Florida drug dealer and get mixed up in a bloody turf war

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: A boy strikes up a friendship with his neighbour, a retired misbehaving curmudgeon

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: A chance to catch supervixen Angelina Jolie and her father John Voight in the same film, an explosive action tale adapted from the popular video game. The eponymous heroine races against time to find an ancient relic before it falls into the wrong hands. The buxom adventurer battles a variety of fantastical creatures with the knowledge that the fate of mankind rests in her hands. New 'Bond' Daniel Craig also stars

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: A Jewish woman attempts to reclaim her family's property, which was stolen six decades earlier during WWII. With the help of an ambitious young lawyer, she starts legal proceedings in various countries around the world

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: In this intense thrill ride, street-racing mechanic Tobey embarks on a cross-country mission of vengeance against shady ex-NASCAR driver Dino, who framed him for a crime he didn't commit. Now, Tobey must defeat Dino in a major underground race with the help of Julia, an ingenious car broker

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Get Even Before Leavin'. With the Russian mob threatening his family, Ray goes on a road trip with Mickey to Primm in hopes of recovering money stolen from a local casino owner. Meanwhile, Terry gains confidence as a trainer and gets renewed interest in the gym; and Bunchy and Bridget take turns looking after baby Maria when Teresa withdraws to her family's house to seek refuge from the pressures of being a new mom

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: Life Is a Carnival. A group of roadies tour with a rock band. In the opener, the loyal crew of the Staton-House Band get a jolt when a slick British financial advisor is hired to overhaul the tour's finances

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: What Would Phil Do?. An array of crises land on Bill after the band puts on a disastrous show

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: The Bryce Newman Letter. Bryce Newman, a notorious music blogger, pens a scathing post about the band, so Reg invites him to the group's next show to smooth things over. But the crew takes matters into its own hands

programme.title: Roadies
programme.sub-title: The City Whose Name Must Not Be Spoken
programme.desc: The City Whose Name Must Not Be Spoken. The crew become victims of a mythical rock and roll curse and try to break it by completing some odd tasks. Meanwhile, Bill and Shelli search for Rick, the band's hard-living bassist, who has gone missing(c)

programme.title: Roadies (?)
programme.desc: Friends and Family.(c)

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: Friends and Family. Needy friends and family descend upon the crew when the band visits Denver, their hometown. Meanwhile, Christopher House's infamous ex-girlfriend, Janine, appears and must be kept away from him at all costs

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: A troubled boxer attempts to get his life together and regain his championship title after his wife is killed and his daughter is taken away by child services. In order to get back in fighting shape, he works with a hardened trainer at a run-down gym

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as troubled boxer Billy Hope in this high-stakes drama from director Antoine Fuqua and Sons of Anarachy creator Kurt Sutter. At the height of his fame and success, Hope is convinced by his loving wife Maureen (Rachel McAdams) to retire from the sport in order to spend more time with the couple's daughter Leila (Oona Laurence). On the night of his retirement announcement, a rival boxer calls out Hope and an altercation breaks out, killing Maureen. Hope's self-destructive behavior worsens, and Leila is taken away by child services. In order to redeem his life and get his daughter back, Hope must return to boxing under the tutelage of hardened trainer Titus "Tick" Willis (Forest Whitaker)(n)

programme.title: Roadies

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: In this heart-pounding thriller, a Russian Special Forces soldier must escape from a mysterious island where people are harvested for their organs and continue on her quest to rescue her sister

programme.title: Why Horror?
programme.desc: A horror-movie fan interviews lovers of the genre to understand why people like to be scared

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: Space camp serves as a proving ground for a group of bright youths who use their knowledge of science and astrophysics to rescue astronauts stranded on the International Space Station following an unexpected crisis. For as far back as he can remember, Jimmy Hawkins (Thomas Horn) has dreamed of exploring the stars and visiting the International Space Station, just like his father, retired NASA astronaut Capt. Andy Hawkins (Dermot Mulroney). Space travel is no child's game, however, and Jimmy, a bright young astrophysics whiz, knows that both of his parents have serious reservations about his deep-rooted desire to follow in his father's footsteps. After furtively applying to win a seat on the next space shuttle, Jimmy learns that he has been accepted into a prestigious space camp run by Col. Roy Manley (Josh Lucas). Once there, Jimmy and a team of teens called the Warriors enter into a heated rivalry against the highly competitive Titans. The Warriors are just about to admit defeat when an emergency aboard the International Space Station leaves three astronauts isolated and alone hundreds of miles above Earth. With the fates of the helpless astronauts hanging in the balance, Jimmy and his team hatch an innovative rescue plan that impresses Commander Phillips (Danny Glover), and offers newfound hope for the future of space exploration

programme.title: Gordo
programme.desc: A young father leaves his successful taco stand in Mexico to start his own restaurant in the U.S

programme.title: Dreamscape
programme.desc: Political thriller, with psychic dream research as the premise. Dennis Quaid, Max von Sydow, Kate Capshaw, Christopher Plummer, Eddie Albert. Glatman: David Patrick Kelly. Charlie: George Wendt. Webber: Larry Gelman. Directed by Joseph Ruben

programme.title: Don't Blink
programme.desc: Ten friends are stranded at an abandoned mountain resort, and begin to disappear one by one. Later, the few who remain race to find an answer before they vanish into thin air

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: A group of campers hunker down in a medieval Turkish town and play a mysterious party game that quickly escalates into something far more sinister

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: In this innovative thriller, teens playing a spooky flashlight game in the woods at night get more than they bargained for when a demon is awakened by their shenanigans

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: A haunting tale of a widow with psychic powers who gets involved in a murder mystery

programme.title: Reeker
programme.desc: David Payne's imaginative slasher in which five teens are stranded in a deserted town when their car breaks down. Taking refuge for the night in a deserted motel, they find that they are not alone - a malodorous murderer is lurking, eager for teenage blood

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: In this spooky and surreal chiller, an American movie producer (Anastasia Hille) searching for her birth parents inherits a house in Russia that holds dark and dangerous secrets from her past. Directed by Nacho Cerda

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: In this thrilling adaptation of the beloved novel, a young man living in a totalitarian society learns the true history of his community from a mysterious yet seemingly benevolent figure known as the Giver. In time, the youth finds the burden of the truth too great to bear and plots to escape

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: A demonic lumberjack terrorizes the staff of a church camp as they prepare for spring break

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a trio of sadistic misfits hold the staff of a Mexican restaurant hostage with some peculiar ideas about the evening's menu in mind

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: A young bride says "until death do us part," but finds that doesn't necessarily put an end to her romance in this offbeat blend of horror, comedy, and romance. Danny (Graham Sibley) and Denise (Tracy Coogan) are a young couple who have just gotten married and head off to a beachside bungalow to celebrate their honeymoon. While enjoying a sunny afternoon on the beach, Danny and Denise's idyllic getaway takes a turn for the worse when a monster rises from the ocean and attacks Danny. The creature spews poison into Danny's mouth, and soon the new husband is dead. But Danny isn't gone for long -- he unexpectedly regains consciousness, but Denise soon learns that her new mate has become a flesh-eating zombie, and that the former vegetarian now has a taste for human beings. But Danny still has one link with the world of the living -- he loves Denise with all his heart, and struggles to keep his monstrous appetites under control for her sake, while Denise remains deeply in love with Danny, and tries to adjust to the strange and monstrous changes taking place in the man she married. Zombie Honeymoon was written and directed by Dave Gebroe, who was inspired to make the film by his sister, a horror film fan who lost her husband in a surfing accident not long after they were wed

programme.title: Exorcismus
programme.desc: When insular teenager Emily's behaviour turns bizarre and terrible things happen to those close to her, her parents turn to an exorcist(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: In a world devoid of all conflict, a teenager causes chaos after getting a glimpse of his community's troubled past(n)

programme.title: Wet Foot/Dry Foot
programme.desc: Two Cuban refugees trying to pilot a homemade raft to the United States become stranded on a deserted island off of Florida. Francisco Gattorno, Jorge Luis Álvarez. Written and directed by Carlos V. Gutierrez(n)

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: Three high-tech tribes engage in a deadly war for supremacy and survival on a distant planet(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: A banished warrior and a hermit wizard must team up to battle a powerful druid in an effort to save the Celt people in the dark ages of Britain(n)

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Creatures of the night find new prey on the scariest night of the year in this horror story. It's Halloween night, and four friends -- Allison (Vanessa Horneff), Elliott (Wil Horneff), Trevor (Karl Jacob), and Brian (Sean Reid) -- are on a road trip en route to a friend's wedding when their car breaks down after running into something. Looking for help, the four happen upon the farmhouse of an elderly couple, Elvin (Richard Little) and May (Barbara Wilhide), which is located next to a huge barn. Elvin and May have already become lost in the darkness of the barn, and soon two of the lost travelers are suffering the same fate as they search for friendly strangers. However, while they can barely see a hand in front of their face, they discover they're not alone in the barn, which has become home to a huge swarm of bloodthirsty bats. The Roost is framed by an introduction and postscript from a television horror show host, played by Tom Noonan(n)

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: An exploration of the decline of video-game giant Atari and its secret burial of unsold "E.T." game cartridges in a New Mexico landfill(n)

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A high school student discovers he's a werewolf after his parents are savagely murdered. He later ends up in a remote mountain town, where he meets others of his kind and fights for the love of a beautiful woman(n)

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: A supernatural being torments a family one year after the death of their daughter(n)

programme.title: The Hybrid

programme.desc: In this imaginative satire, famed graphic designer Charles Swan III finds his life spiraling out of control after he is dumped by his girlfriend and becomes lost in his delusions. Meanwhile, Charles' friends try to help him get over his heartbreak

programme.title: Greetings From Tim Buckley
programme.desc: In this moving biopic, musician Jeff Buckley prepares for a concert that he hopes will give him his big break. Meanwhile, he has a memorable affair with a young woman and reflects on his father, a famous singer who died of a drug overdose

programme.title: Just Let Go: Lenny Kravitz Live
programme.desc: A six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York is chronicled and examines the relationship between him and his illustrious band, who talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Kravitz's quest for perfection

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Med school dropout Daniel Radcliffe meets his ideal girl, only to discover she already has a boyfriend. Can the perfect pair keep things platonic?

programme.title: The Way of the Gun
programme.desc: In this suspense thriller, two small-time crooks make a bid for the big time with disastrous results. Robin (Juliette Lewis) is carrying a child as a surrogate mother for a wealthy couple, Hale and Francesca Chidduck (Scott Wilson and Kristin Lehman) when she's kidnapped by Parker (Ryan Phillippe) and Longbaugh (Benicio Del Toro), who believe that the adoptive parents will pay a large ransom to ensure the safety of both mother and baby. The kidnappers soon discover that they're out of their league when they're confronted by Mafia-connected lawyer Joe Sarno (James Caan) and a pair of hired killers, Jeffers (Taye Diggs) and Obecks (Nicky Katt); at the same time, Parker finds himself increasingly attached to Robin. The Way of the Gun marked the directorial debut of screenwriter Christopher McQuarrie, whose script credits include The Usual Suspects and Public Access

programme.title: 21 Years: Richard Linklater
programme.desc: This affectionate profile of indie director Richard Linklater examines his life and creative process in an attempt to explain the mind-set that brought "Dazed and Confused," "Boyhood" and the "Before Sunrise" trilogy to the big screen

programme.title: Spark: A Burning Man Story
programme.desc: Get a behind-the-scenes glimpse of the Burning Man Festival, where for one week every year, 60,000 revelers convene in the Nevada desert for a free-spirited celebration of life and art

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: A streetdancer travels the world to assemble a crew of the world's best dancers following a humiliating defeat, hoping to win at a competition in Paris

Craig Fairbrass, Terry Stone, Roland Manookian, Coralie Rose. Directed by Julian Gilbey(r)

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Trainspotting is acknowledged to be one of the most original films to come out of Britain in the last decade, with an impact that goes beyond its influence on other filmmakers and extending to the world of pop and fashion. Made by Shallow Grave trio Danny Boyle, John Hodge and Andrew Macdonald, Trainspotting paved the way for the current boom in British film. This multi-award-winning, Oscar-nominated film is adapted from Irvine Welsh's novel(r)

programme.desc: Bigfoot stalks five friends during a camping trip in the East Texas wilderness(n)

programme.title: The Thaw
programme.desc: As a recognized environmental attorney, dr. David Kruipen, discovers a prehistoric species in the inland ice, he takes a team of four ecology students on a research mission to a remote base in the Arctic. The group makes a discovery that goes beyond their wildest fantasies. An unknown and lethal parasite has been revived and is now searching for a new and warm-blooded host(n)

programme.title: Common

programme.title: Echoes of War

programme.title: Leave the World Behind
programme.desc: Electronic-music group Swedish House Mafia embark on their final world tour(n)

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya (?)
Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg stars in Antoine Fuqua's thriller as Bob Swagger, an ex-Special Ops sharpshooter. He's called out of retirement by Col Isaac Johnson to help foil an assassination attempt on the President, but ends up framed as the assassin. Injured and on the run, he can only rely on Sara Fenn, the girlfriend of his ex-partner, and FBI agent Nick Memphis, who's come across evidence of the conspiracy. The three have to evade Johnson and his cohorts in a race to prove their innocence in this intelligent action movie(n)

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Dangerous convict Jack Conrad, awaiting execution for crimes he did not commit, is bought by a television producer and taken to a deserted island in the South Pacific. There he is offered the oportunity to escape Death Row by taking part in a number of fights to the death with other prisoners. Breckel, the corrupt producer, plans to broadcast the illegal tournament live over the internet, but there could be more to Jack than meets the eye(n)

programme.title: NYC Underground
programme.desc: Rich Manhattan kids head to Brooklyn for a concert, and cross a group of thugs who send them fleeing into the subway system(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: A mechanic who moonlights as an underground race-car driver strives to take the top prize in America's most prominent street race in order to have his revenge against the ambitious ex-NASCAR champ who had him framed and sent to prison. Inspired by the popular video-game franchise of the same name, Need for Speed tells the story of garage owner Tobey Marshall (Aaron Paul). Desperate to keep his family-owned business afloat, Marshall forms an uncomfortable partnership with wealthy ex-NASCAR star Dino Brewster (Dominic Cooper). That partnership falls apart when a lucrative sale to car broker Julia Bonet (Imogen Poots) fails to pan out, and unscrupulous Brewster uses a tragic street-racing mishap to have the innocent Marshall incarcerated. Released from prison two years later, the vengeful Marshall plots to prove his mettle by winning the De Leon -- an illicit race showcasing the country's top underground talents. But getting to the De Leon will be no simple task, because not only has the ruthless Brewster put a bounty on Marshall's prized car, but the police are hot on his trail during the white-knuckle, coast-to-coast dash. Fortunately for Marshall, his loyal crew and Bonet are willing to help him get to the starting line in time for the big race. Scott "Kid Cudi" Mescudi, Ramon Rodriguez, and Michael Keaton co-star(n)

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg stars in Antoine Fuqua's thriller as Bob Swagger, an ex-Special Ops sharpshooter. He's called out of retirement by Col Isaac Johnson to help foil an assassination attempt on the President, but ends up framed as the assassin. The three have to evade Johnson and his cohorts in a race to prove their innocence in this intelligent action movie(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief (John Travolta) gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate

programme.title: Freedom Writers
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars as Erin Gruwell in Richard lagravenese's gritty drama, based on a true-life story. Gruwell is a fresh-faced teacher at a tough inner city school in Long Beach, California, armed with lesson plans and reading lists. Finding her students more interested in recent gang shootings than poetry, she refuses to give up on them, teaching instead books and writings that relate to their lives. Imelda Staunton plays Margaret Campbell, her draconian head of department, with Patrick Dempsey as Erin's long suffering husband

programme.title: Hidalgo

programme.title: Pound of Flesh

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: Jared Paul and Andrew Mogel's comedy The D Train stars Jack Black as Dan, a man in charge of organizing his high-school reunion. In the hopes of getting people to turn out, Dan becomes obsessed with getting Oliver Lawless (James Marsden), a classmate who is the star of a national advertising campaign, to come to the bash. Dan hunts down Oliver in L.A. and uses whatever means he can think of to manipulate Oliver into coming to the event. However, Dan's drive for Oliver's approval causes trouble in his relationships with his family and friends. The D Train screened at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: A small-town girl joins the military and becomes a guard at Guantanamo Bay, where she forges a delicate, transformative bond with an inmate who raises some compelling questions about his incarceration

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: A boy strikes up a friendship with his neighbour, a retired misbehaving curmudgeon

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The story revolves around Dr. Hannibal Lector, arrested for molestation, flees from custody. The story takes a turn when one of the vitims makes a plan to avenge the doctor

programme.title: Good Luck Chuck
programme.desc: Rollicking sex comedy stars Dane Cook as a cursed dentist who becomes the object of every single woman's affections when they learn that each woman he sleeps with marries the very next man she dates. A delightful Jessica Alba costars as the girl of his dreams, whom he's afraid to bed because then she'll find true love with the next man in her life. Dan Fogler is a hoot as Cook's licentious plastic-surgeon buddy. Directed by Mark Helfrich. Ellia English, Sasha Pieterse, Lonny Ross(n)

programme.desc: Public Enemy perform at Metropolis Studios in London(n)

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: When a hard-luck blue-collar worker and his two best friends are mistaken for Army Reservists by a tough-talking Army sergeant, the plane set to fly them to the front lines of Iraq mistakenly drops them in the middle of Mexico to disastrous results in a freewheeling military comedy starring Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall, and D.J. Qualls. Larry (the Cable Guy) has lost his job and his woman in the short span of 24 hours. Convinced that some suds and target shooting are just the right remedies for a broken, jobless heart, Larry sets out with his next-door neighbor Bill (Engvall) and their trigger-happy pal Everett (Qualls) in order to blast off some rounds and down some brews. Their relaxing weekend soon takes an unexpected turn, however, when hard-case Army sergeant Kilgrove (Keith David) mistakes the trio as slacking Army reservists and loads them in a plane bound for Fallujah. Subsequently air-dropped over Mexico due to pilot error, the clueless, wannabe war heroes become convinced that they're actually in the Middle East and set out to save a rural village from what they assume to be an insurgent uprising. Though the thankful locals champion the noble but dimwitted trio for their heroism, the celebration is short-lived as ruthless warlord Carlos Santana (Danny Trejo) pays a personal visit to the town with a plan to confront the fearless warriors who dared to challenge his iron-fist rule(n)

programme.title: Sicko
programme.desc: Michael Moore diagnoses the state of the American healthcare system in this provocative documentary. Included: testimony from insurance executives and patients who were denied reimbursement; comparisons with health care in other countries(n)

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: A modern-day marine biologist (Josh Hartnett) slips into a coma, taking him on an epic journey through time while exploring his undying love for a woman that spanned four centuries. As he fights for his life on a hospital bed, his journey through the First Anglo-Maratha War becomes interwoven through passion and love(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: In a world devoid of all conflict, a teenager causes chaos after getting a glimpse of his community's troubled past(n)

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Matt Damon plays Tom Ripley, a sociopathic murderer in the making sent to Italy to bring back Dickie Greenleaf, the son of a shipping tycoon. But, envious of Dickie's lifestyle, he decides that it would be simpler to murder him and take over his identity. Only Dickie's girlfriend Marge and friend Freddie Miles stand in his way... Anthony Minghella's Oscar-nominated, Bafta winning film, based on Patricia Highsmith's murderous character, mixes the glamour of '50s Italy with Damon's superb portrayal of a worryingly sympathetic killer(n)

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: This rousing crime thriller follows an ex-con as he pulls off one last heist in order to pay his daughter's kidnapper, who mistakenly believes he possesses $10 million worth of stolen bonds(n)

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: Remake of the 1950s western about a rancher who turns a notorious outlaw over to the authorities. In a bid to pay off his debts, the man agrees to join the team of men escorting the outlaw across country to the titular train, which will transport him to Yuma Prison. However, the rancher and his comrades soon find themselves pitted against the outlaw's band of vicious followers, who are desperate to rescue him(n)

programme.title: The Life Aquatic With Steve Zissou
programme.desc: A famous oceanographer and his trusty crew seek revenge on the shark that ate his best friend in this quirky comedy-adventure(n)

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: A talented though weird New York family comes together around their dying dad. But is he really unwell?(n)

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: An American ex-military agent (Robert De Niro) strikes up a friendship with a one-time Serbian soldier (John Travolta) posing as a tourist in this Evan Daugherty-penned thriller directed by Ghost Rider's Mark Steven Johnson(n)

programme.title: Classic Boxing
programme.desc: No additional information is available

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A slick, trigger-happy detective flouts the law as he goes on the hunt for a rich murderer whose power and influence could get him off the hook. Crime thriller

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: The story of the historic 1836 battle in the Texan War of Independence. Facing 4,000 Mexican troops, 186 Texan soldiers and volunteers - including William Travis, Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie retreat within the walls of the Alamo, a Franciscan mission that was converted into a military fort. Once inside, the men prepare themselves for what will be a bloody battle to the death

programme.title: Wild Bill
programme.desc: Western biopic about the icon of the frontier, Wild Bill Hickok, who survived a series of potentially fatal illnesses only to meet his end during a poker game in which he held what became known as the dead man's hand. An eventful life saw him become one of the most feared gunmen in America, as he cut a swathe of violence through several states

programme.title: The Way of the Gun
programme.desc: In this suspense thriller, two small-time crooks make a bid for the big time with disastrous results. Robin (Juliette Lewis) is carrying a child as a surrogate mother for a wealthy couple, Hale and Francesca Chidduck (Scott Wilson and Kristin Lehman) when she's kidnapped by Parker (Ryan Phillippe) and Longbaugh (Benicio Del Toro), who believe that the adoptive parents will pay a large ransom to ensure the safety of both mother and baby. The kidnappers soon discover that they're out of their league when they're confronted by Mafia-connected lawyer Joe Sarno (James Caan) and a pair of hired killers, Jeffers (Taye Diggs) and Obecks (Nicky Katt); at the same time, Parker finds himself increasingly attached to Robin. The Way of the Gun marked the directorial debut of screenwriter Christopher McQuarrie, whose script credits include The Usual Suspects and Public Access

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A corrupt medieval emperor exploits his citizens and rules his kingdom with impunity. When the nobleman and mentor Bartok (Morgan Freeman) refuses to pay a bribe to one of the emperor's cronies, a death sentence is placed upon him. Bartok's loyal followers are lead by Raiden (Clive Owen), a highly skilled warrior who is deeply affected by Bartok's murder. Raiden and his clan band together to fight back against the oppressive emperor in this medieval action thriller

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: An exploration of the decline of video-game giant Atari and its secret burial of unsold "E.T." game cartridges in a New Mexico landfill

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: When a criminal plot to heist a shipment of drugs leads to a dock full of corpses, US Customs Agent David Kujan must squeeze the truth out of the only eye- witness, slippery con Verbal Kint

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: James Wan's mould-breaking crime-horror opens in a derelict public toilet. Two men, Adam (Leigh Whannell) and Dr Lawrence Gordon, are chained to the walls by leg irons. Between them are a corpse, a gun, a tape recorder and a saw. They are the latest victims of The Jigsaw Killer, a serial killer with a penchant for setting up bizarre scenarios for his victims (the film shows some of his previous grisly escapades) and as they find out, only one of them will walk (or rather, hobble) to freedom. On the killer's trail are cops David Tapp (Danny Glover) and Steven Sing, but can they find his latest victims before time runs out?

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: Obsessed with teaching his victims the value of life, a deranged, sadistic serial killer called Jigsaw abducts the morally wayward. This time, Jigsaw has once again locked in a few chosen people in a booby trapped shelter. They must find their way out before a lethal nerve gas spreads, and without getting caught in any traps

programme.title: The Spymasters: CIA in the Crosshairs
programme.desc: An inside look at the CIA includes interviews with 12 of the agency's directors and four top operatives who discuss their failures and their previously classified successes(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: In this nail-biting international thriller, a couple (Owen Wilson and Lake Bell) and their two daughters relocate to Asia, only to find themselves caught in the middle of a dangerous coup. Realizing that foreigners are being murdered on the spot, they make a desperate decision to escape the violence on the streets and seek refuge at the American Embassy, all while trying to avoid detection by the merciless rebels. Directed by John Erick Dowdle. Pierce Brosnan co-stars(n)

programme.title: Iverson

programme.desc: A small-town girl joins the military and becomes a guard at Guantanamo Bay, where she forges a delicate, transformative bond with an inmate who raises some compelling questions about his incarceration in this powerful drama(n)

Realizing that foreigners are being murdered on the spot, they make a desperate decision to escape the violence on the streets and seek refuge at the American Embassy, all while trying to avoid detection by the merciless rebels. programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: A chance to catch supervixen Angelina Jolie and her father John Voight in the same film, an explosive action tale adapted from the popular video game. The eponymous heroine races against time to find an ancient relic before it falls into the wrong hands. The buxom adventurer battles a variety of fantastical creatures with the knowledge that the fate of mankind rests in her hands. New 'Bond' Daniel Craig also stars

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: Second in a Penelope Cruz triple bill. Recently re-made as Vanilla Sky, Alejandro Amenabar's superior original stars Eduardo Noriega (The Devil's Backbone) as a handsome playboy who, meeting his friend's girlfriend Penelope Cruz (who also starred in Vanilla Sky), steals her away. But one of his ex-girlfriends (Najwa Nimri) deliberately disfigures him in a car crash. Snubbed by Cruz, offered a lifeline of restorative surgery but subject to uncontrollable rages, Noriega's life takes unexpected twists and turns in this dazzling, twisting, fascinating classic of the art of movie making

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: A small-town girl joins the military and becomes a guard at Guantanamo Bay, where she forges a delicate, transformative bond with an inmate who raises some compelling questions about his incarceration

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: After her father is killed in a car accident, a young girl and her family move to her great-grandmother's farm in Virgina. In time, she learns more about her dad and follows in his footsteps as a writer in this heartwarming and inspirational drama

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In a fantastical alternate universe, only people with the same innate frequency can be together. Despite this, a young man falls for a woman with a different frequency, and must defy the very rules of reality for his love

programme.title: Away From Her
programme.desc: Filmmaker Atom Egoyan -- a longtime onscreen collaborator with the gifted young actress Sarah Polley (The Sweet Hereafter) -- executive-produced Polley's directorial debut, Away from Her, starring Julie Christie, Olympia Dukakis, Michael Murphy, and Wendy Crewson. Adapted by Polley from a short story by Alice Munro, this small-scaled two-character drama concerns Grant (Gordon Pinsent) and Fiona (Christie), a long-married couple, well into their golden years, who are much in love and connected to one another on every level. "Soul mates" in the purest sense of the term, the two feel a sense of ease and tranquility in their rural home. But when Fiona's memory begins to slip away and she insists on being taken to a rest home, the decision stirs up torrents of guilt and regret in Grant's heart. The rules of the center only complicate matters, as they forbid visitation and communication with Fiona for an interminable period of time. He determines to support his wife at all costs, even if must happen at the expense of his own peace of mind

programme.title: Dr. T and the Women
programme.desc: The story of a wealthy Dallas gynaecologist whose life begins to fall apart at the seams when his wife suffers a nervous breakdown during a shopping spree, but then he falls for an attractive golf pro. He sends her to a mental hospital with the hopes of a full recovery, but her regression into childhood seems to be permanent. Adding to the mass confusion is an unexpected visit from his alcoholic sister-in-law, Peggy, who brings along her three children, as well as the constant battles between Dr. T's two daughters: the soon-to-be-married Dee Dee and the jealous Connie. Upon meeting his country club's new assistant golf pro, Bree, Dr. T finally feels like he's met his match - a beautiful, independent woman who has no desire to be swept off her feet(r)

programme.title: Heather McDonald: I Don't Mean to Brag (?)
Alfie
programme.desc: Michael Caine, in his breakthrough role, stars as Alfie Elkins, a shallow and amoral sexual hedonist whose series of amorous adventures lead eventually to loneliness in Lewis Gilbert's swinging-sixties comedy drama(r)

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: Titanic shipmates Kathy Bates, Leonardo DiCaprio, and Kate Winslet step onboard for director Sam Mendes' tale of suburban malaise in 1950s-era Connecticut. Adapted from the classic 1961 novel by author Richard Yates, Revolutionary Road tells the tale of a young couple whose once-idealistic relationship steadily deteriorates into a ceaseless cycle of petty jealousy and bickering as they strive to retain their independence in the world of picket fences and perfectly manicured lawns

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek and Fiona's (Mike Myers and Cameron Diaz, respectively) fairy-tale wedding has gone off without a hitch, yet just as the beaming newlyweds prepare to enjoy their blissful "happily ever after," the sudden death of King Harold (John Cleese) finds everyone's favorite ornery ogre being reluctantly fitted for the royal crown. Troubled to learn that not only will he be compelled to rule Far Far Away, but that he and Fiona are also expecting a little ogre, Shrek determines to track down his new bride's rebellious cousin, Artie (Justin Timberlake) -- the one true heir to the throne -- in order to focus on fatherhood without the added distraction of having to preside over the kingdom. As Shrek sets out with faithful companions Donkey (Eddie Murphy) and Puss in Boots (Antonio Banderas) to locate the medieval high-school slacker and bring him back to become the reigning sovereign of Far Far Away, handsome snake Prince Charming (Rupert Everett) slithers back to the castle in the company of the dreaded Captain Hook (Ian McShane) to stage a diabolically timed coup and assume control of the throne. Now, as Shrek, Donkey, and Puss in Boots do their best to wrangle up the feisty Artie, Fiona must enlist the aid of fighting princesses Snow White (Amy Poehler), Sleeping Beauty (Cheri Oteri), Rapunzel (Maya Rudolph), and Cinderella (Amy Sedaris) to barricade the castle and fend off Prince Charming's invading army of fairy-tale villains until her beloved husband can return with the cavalry to save the day(n)

programme.title: Eulogy
programme.desc: Writer/director Michael Clancy makes his feature film debut with the black comedy Eulogy. Zooey Deschanel plays Kate Collins, an unhappy college student who is made even more unhappy when her grandfather (Rip Torn) dies. Even though the entire family hates each other, they reunite at the home of Grandma Collins (Piper Laurie). Among other family members, Kate observes a war between her washed-up actor dad, Daniel (Hank Azaria); her lesbian Aunt Lucy (Kelly Preston); her wound-up Uncle Skip (Ray Romano); and her strict Aunt Alice (Debra Winger). Tensions escalate and family secrets are ultimately revealed. Kate is also inundated with the eulogy-writing duties, as she's the only one capable of such a task. Meanwhile, she reunites with old flame Ryan Carmichael (Jesse Bradford). Eulogy premiered at the Sundance Film Festival in 2004(n)

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek and Fiona's (Mike Myers and Cameron Diaz, respectively) fairy-tale wedding has gone off without a hitch, yet just as the beaming newlyweds prepare to enjoy their blissful "happily ever after," the sudden death of King Harold (John Cleese) finds everyone's favorite ornery ogre being reluctantly fitted for the royal crown. Troubled to learn that not only will he be compelled to rule Far Far Away, but that he and Fiona are also expecting a little ogre, Shrek determines to track down his new bride's rebellious cousin, Artie (Justin Timberlake) -- the one true heir to the throne -- in order to focus on fatherhood without the added distraction of having to preside over the kingdom. As Shrek sets out with faithful companions Donkey (Eddie Murphy) and Puss in Boots (Antonio Banderas) to locate the medieval high-school slacker and bring him back to become the reigning sovereign of Far Far Away, handsome snake Prince Charming (Rupert Everett) slithers back to the castle in the company of the dreaded Captain Hook (Ian McShane) to stage a diabolically timed coup and assume control of the throne. Now, as Shrek, Donkey, and Puss in Boots do their best to wrangle up the feisty Artie, Fiona must enlist the aid of fighting princesses Snow White (Amy Poehler), Sleeping Beauty (Cheri Oteri), Rapunzel (Maya Rudolph), and Cinderella (Amy Sedaris) to barricade the castle and fend off Prince Charming's invading army of fairy-tale villains until her beloved husband can return with the cavalry to save the day

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Following up The Country Bears and Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl, Disney continued their theme-park-attraction-based film kick with this horror comedy from director Rob Minkoff (Stuart Little). The Haunted Mansion stars Eddie Murphy as Jim Evers, an overworked patriarch who, along with his neglected family, finds himself in mansion inhabited by 999 ghosts. Once the fright wears off, the inhabitants of the other side teach Evers a lesson about the importance of family. Along with Don Knotts, who's had his share of spooky experiences in Disney flicks, the film also stars Terence Stamp, Aree Davis, and Jennifer Tilly

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Murray Takes It to the Next Level
programme.desc: Murray Takes It to the Next Level. When Murray decides to move Bret and Jemaine up from the level of 'colleagues' to 'friends', they meet Murray's best friend Jim and accidentally insult him. Comedy series about Kiwi folk musicians Bret and Jemaine as they to try to make it big in New York

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: A man battles for the release of a girl, kidnapped by a crazed extortionist, as a bomb ticks away in a crowded hockey stadium

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, a.k.a Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop down in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: Genetically mutated sharks try to exact revenge on the research scientists who experimented on them

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: A financially strapped single mother descends into a dark world in order to protect her family. Meanwhile, her son confronts the town bully and discovers a hidden utopia

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Will Smith stars as Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's heavyweight biopic of the boxing icon. Co-starring Jamie Foxx and Jon Voight. (2001)(160 mins)

programme.title: The Jacket
programme.desc: Psychological thriller with Adrien Brody as a troubled war veteran trying to unlock his memories

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: A Trusty Steed. A school evaluator's arrival rattles Gamby and Russell, who cross boundaries with Dr. Brown

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Tale of a broken-down former pro-wrestling superstar fallen on hard times and grappling with a rocky personal life while looking for a chance at a comeback in the ring

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Chronicle of the seminal rap group N.W.A. and their 'hood-to-riches success, tracing their story from the mean streets of mid-'80s Compton to their triumphant battles against censorship

programme.title: 2016 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony
programme.desc: The 31st annual gala honors Cheap Trick, Chicago, Deep Purple, Steve Miller, N.W.A. and songwriter-producer Bert Berns. Taped April 8, 2016, in Brooklyn at the Barclays Center

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: In this hilarious, offbeat detective story set in 1970 California, a drug-addled PI probes a conspiracy involving his ex-flame and her married, real-estate-developer boyfriend. Along the way, various eccentric characters complicate the investigation(n)

programme.title: Georgia Rule
programme.desc: Rachel is sent to stay with her grandmother after causing trouble for her mum and stepdad(n)

programme.title: Dark Floors
programme.desc: A man and his autistic daughter attempt to escape a hospital overrun by evil monsters. As he fights to find a way out, the father realizes his daughter may be the key to their survival(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Straight Outta Compton'
programme.desc: A look at "Straight Outta Compton," a 2015 drama that chronicles the history of the hip-hop group NWA in 1980s California. The film stars Jason Mitchell, Corey Hawkins, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Aldis Hodge and Neil Brown Jr., and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: Take the Lead
programme.desc: A classical dancer volunteers to teach ballroom to a gang on unruly high schoolers, with surprising results(n)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A mousy college freshman living on her own in New York City meets Brooke, her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: This satirical comedy starring Sandra Bullock as a political consultant gives viewers an inside look at the high-stakes, win-at-all-costs world of politics. Bullock stars as "Calamity" Jane Bodine, who is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival Pat Candy (Billy Bob Thornton), who is working on the opponent's campaign and is also looking for every opportunity to antagonize Jane. The film is loosely based on the 2005 documentary of the same name by Rachel Boynton. Directed by David Gordon Green (Pineapple Express, George Washington). Produced by Oscar-winners George Clooney and Grant Heslov(n)

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration(n)

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily(n)

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Movie star Vincent Chase makes his directorial debut, but runs into trouble when he goes over budget in this raunchy satire of Hollywood. Meanwhile, E prepares for the birth of his child, Johnny Drama seeks a breakout role and Turtle tries to woo MMA fighter Ronda Rousey. Based on the HBO series(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: This satirical comedy starring Sandra Bullock as a political consultant gives viewers an inside look at the high-stakes, win-at-all-costs world of politics. Bullock stars as "Calamity" Jane Bodine, who is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls.
